summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA's Liptide Lip Mask is an intensely hydrating lip mask, infused with peptide-rich Liptide Complex + nourishing Babassu Oil + PHA. This ultra-rich treatment supercharges skin function to repair and restore lips while you sleep– minimizing water loss for a plumper pout by morning.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight mask supercharges skin– repairing and restoring lipsLiptide Complex powered by peptides, ceramides + lipids plumps + hydratesPHA gently exfoliates to enhance cell turnoverHelps heal dry, damaged lips – fastVegan and cruelty freeFeaturesMulti-purpose leave-on mask can be used as a hydrating lip mask throughout the day or an overnight treatmentBYOMA's Liptide Complex- a lip-compatible blend of actives- strengthens the skin barrier + minimizes water loss for full, healthy lipsSkin-loving ingredients work fast to intensely hydrate and condition dry, chapped lipsKey IngredientsLiptide Complex works to strengthen the skin barrier for fuller, healthier lipsBabassu Oil intensely replenishes skin's moisture levels and nourishes skinPHA gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells, revealing smooth, hydrated lipsItem 2621902How To UseApply generously to the lips in the PM before bed and throughout day as needed.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Synthetic Wax, Fragrance, Lithospermum Erythrorhizon Root Extract, Sorbitan Isostearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Extract, Gluconolactone, Mandelic Acid, Glycerin, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sphingolipids, Water, Ceramide NP, Lactic Acid, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Apply generously to the lips in the PM before bed and throughout day as needed.

reviews.headline: Lips were raw!
reviews.comments: I have never had an allergic reaction to any product ever but I did with this one! After applying two nights in a row my lips felt sunburned and raw. The packaging also leaves some to be desired.

reviews.headline: Great product. Meh packaging
reviews.comments: This lip blam has a really nice feel. Very moisturizing and lasted all night for me. However, the packaging needs work. The doefoot is difficult to get out. Otherwise I love it! Great price point.

reviews.headline: Lip mask is the best
reviews.comments: Love it for extra crusty days

reviews.headline: Lip mask is the best
reviews.comments: Love it for extra crusty days

reviews.headline: Lip mask is the best
reviews.comments: Love it for extra crusty days

reviews.headline: Wow!
reviews.comments: I wear a lot of peptide masks and lip balms, but none keep the moisture in like BYOMA's. Too bad they dont come in XL tubes!

reviews.headline: Doesn't last long
reviews.comments: I think this is a cute product and liked the look of the packaging. It seems secure but whats odd is that the applicator is so big that it almost doesnt come out of the tube, and when it does, it takes a lot of the product off. Initial application feels nice, luxurious and rich. I like the way it feels while wearing it, but it unfortunately doesnt last long. I cant consider this to be a lip mask because it doesnt last longer than 20 minutes. Absolutely not something that will work overnight as I had intended it to. I bought once but that is all for me. I do feel that it is nourishing and restoring to the lips, but the formula for longevity as a mask is not there for me.

reviews.headline: Broke before first use
reviews.comments: This smelled great but when I opened it, the doe foot broke off inside. I tried to use it a couple times with just the plastic part, but it felt grainy, like maybe the doe foot was disintegrating or something. I had ordered another lip balm so I returned this and didnt replace it to see if another would be better.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I am obsessed with this lip mask. I use it overnight and my lips feel super hydrated in the morning. It smells so good and feels comfortable on the lips.

reviews.headline: Not it
reviews.comments: This feels nice upon application but I noticed with continued use my lips felt dehydrated. I like the packaging but need more moisture.

reviews.headline: Eh?
reviews.comments: Its really not that bad. I like the formula and how it feels on my lips. The applicator is good too, packaging is cute BUT i feel like the results are not long lasting. My lips still feel dry and sort of easily chapped. Ive used other products that lasted longer and i dont experience chapped/dry lips. Sort of bummed out this one wasnt a holy grail, i had high hopes. Def wouldn't recommend if someone were to ask me about it.

reviews.headline: Love it, Super hydrating
reviews.comments: Ever since purchasing for the first time I have been using this everyday!! Super hydrating and lasts a long time compared to other lip treatments I've tried. Packaging is cute and I haven't experienced any leaking.

reviews.headline: Hydrating Lip Mask
reviews.comments: Even after just one use, I noticed a huge difference in my lips. My super dry and chapped lips were soft and fuller looking the next morning. If you need something to bring life back to your dehydrated lips, this is definitely worth a try!

reviews.headline: I love it but leaks
reviews.comments: I truly do love this product BUT when its turned on its side it does leak, and gets sticky. I like it use it overnight and I wake up with smooth lips. But the only flaw is the leaking.

reviews.headline: I love it but leaks
reviews.comments: I truly do love this product BUT when its turned on its side it does leak, and gets sticky. I like it use it overnight and I wake up with smooth lips. But the only flaw is the leaking.

reviews.headline: Helps repair my chapped lips!
reviews.comments: I was a little hesitant to buy this because it was a little pricy but I figured why not. My lips get very dry & chapped & I have such a bad habit of picking / biting them. I was using lip scrubs thinking that's all I needed when in fact, it was making them worse. This stuff was so easy to use. It's thick, doesn't have much of a smell which is fine by me & has slowly started to help repair my lips! I would definitely considering buying the whole line or just this one alone when I run out.

reviews.headline: I'm disappointed
reviews.comments: I should have listened to the reviews about the packaging. It seemed like people liked the product but not the packaging. I thought i would just make sure to keep it upright to avoid leaks but the wand broke the first time i pulled it out. I couldnt even pull it out without the tip coming off jn the container.

reviews.headline: very meh
reviews.comments: I was excited to try this as I usually love everything Byoma and I've been on the hunt for a new lip mask just to try something new. I don't hate this but I definitely don't love it either. It doesn't give lip mask but more so a lip balm with a different applicator (my favorite thing about this product tbh) and that's fine, just not what I was looking for. It's also not as hydrating/moisturizing as I was hoping it'd be. I'll still use it from time to time because it's not a terrible product overall but definitely won't buy again.

reviews.headline: Don't bother
reviews.comments: I love Byoma and was hoping to love this too but unfortunately it's a total loss for me. My biggest reason for purchasing was the applicator. I hate digging into a balm. The product inside is fine, nothing spectacular and feels a little grainy applying. After multiple separate tests, i can confirm that this is the culprit for breakouts around my chin/upper lip/mouth. The product slides overnight and wherever it sat and landed i was getting pimples.

reviews.headline: Good daily driver
reviews.comments: I love that this lip mask works as both an overnight treatment and a daily balm. The fragrance is very light (and not noticeable on the lips), the texture is non-sticky and moisturizing, and the large applicator makes it easy to swipe on or touch up when needed. Occasionally I will notice some gritty texture and I'm not sure if it's the product or if the applicator is shedding onto my lips.

media.headline: Disappointing product from a fantastic brand :(
Love love love this hydrating mask
Love love love this hydrating mask

faceoff_positive.comments:
I've been using the LipTide Lip Mask gifted by BYOMA, and it's quickly become a must-have in my skincare routine. This lip mask is all about giving your lips a serious dose of hydration while feeling absolutely luxurious.

Hydration & Texture:
The first thing I noticed is how incredibly moisturizing this lip mask is. It's packed with nourishing ingredients that leave my lips feeling soft and plump. The texture is rich but not sticky, making it comfortable to wear overnight or as a daytime lip treatment.

Soothing & Repairing:
It's perfect for those days when my lips feel dry or chapped. After using it, my lips feel instantly soothed, and any cracks or rough patches are noticeably reduced by morning. It's like a rescue treatment in a jar, providing deep repair and protection.

Packaging & Scent:
The packaging is sleek and travel-friendly, and the subtle, pleasant scent adds to the overall experience without being overpowering. A little goes a long way, so the jar lasts quite a while, making it worth the investment.

Final Thoughts:
If you're looking for a lip mask that delivers serious hydration and repair with a touch of luxury, the BYOMA LipTide Lip Mask is definitely worth trying. It leaves your lips feeling soft, smooth, and pampered.
faceoff_positive.headline: Deep hydration with a touch of luxury

faceoff_negative.comments: Byoma has been one of my favorite and most-used skincare brands in the last couple of years. I can't really say that I've had any Byoma products completely fall flat for me, as the very few that haven't worked for my skin have worked really well on my friends' family's different skin types. However, I have to say that I was quite disappointed with this product. Based on how amazing the moisturizers and barrier treatments are, I was really expecting a very hydrating and rich lip mask that would help to hydrate my dry lips. However, I did not find that to be the case. Based on the name of the product and the information on the package, I used the product as an overnight mask in place of my normal Vaseline. When I woke up, I found my lips to be dryer than normal if I do not use anything on my lips. I tried this multiple nights, and the same thing occurred. I know that some people use it as a lip balm/treatment during the day as well, which I tried, and had similar disappointing results. The only way I would use this product would be as a simple clear lipgloss-esque product, but even then, the shine it gives is much less than traditional lipglosses or even the Laneige lip mask (which I am also not the biggest fan of). I really don't know what I would use this for. I still love Byoma and its products and will continue to use and repurchase them, but I can't say this is one I would recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Disappointing product from a fantastic brand :(
